title: Warriors, Le'Veon Bell, LeBron James, and the Cowboys
itunes:title: Warriors, Le'Veon Bell, LeBron James, and the Cowboys
description:
Colin discusses the drama going on between Golden Warriors stars Kevin Durant and Draymond Green, why Steelers RB Le'Veon Bell will regret is decision, why players want to play with Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James, and what he would do with Dallas Cowboys QB Dak Prescott. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Joel Klatt, and Bucky Brooks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
